trans-unit.source: Provides UI support for working with extender controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供在設計階段使用之擴充項控制項的 UI 支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner> class enables you to interact with extender controls on the page at design time in an IDE such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner>類別可讓您使用頁面上的擴充項控制項在設計階段於 IDE 例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Only control developers and IDE developers have to interact with this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 只有控制項開發人員和 IDE 的開發人員必須直接互動與這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard HTML rendering of an extender control at design time, which includes type and ID information.
trans-unit.target: 取得在設計階段擴充項控制項的標準 HTML 呈現，其中包括型別和 ID 資訊。

trans-unit.source: The design-time HTML rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的設計階段 HTML 呈現。

trans-unit.source: A component of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl" /> that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl" /> 介面之型別 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> 的元件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified component and adds it to the component change service.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的元件，並將它加入至元件變更服務。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains the properties for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控制項屬性的字典。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the items listed in the properties grid for the control.
trans-unit.target: 調整控制項屬性方格中所列出的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current control is displayed on the design surface so it can be selected and its properties can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前控制項是否顯示在設計介面上，以便予以選取並編輯其屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current control is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的控制項已顯示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
